item.title: Need help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
